channel.title: OPML Editor on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in OPML Editor on Reflections

item.title: OPML Editor as a wordpress editor
item.description: This is a test post to see if Dave Winer’s OPML editor works with a self-hosted wordpress blog. There is something geeky about seeing crappy fonts on a screen, that makes one want to use a tool more. I’ve known of the OPML editor for a few years now, and have tried several times to find a neat use-case for it in my workflow, and it never had a compelling enough reason for me to stick with it.
